mapper.sql: PURCHASE_ID, BREED_NAME, BREED_STANDARD_LEVEL, BREED_AMOUNT, BREED_PRICE, BREED_PLACE, BREED_DESC, "STATUS", CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_MOBILE, APPLY_RESOURCE
mapper.insert:
insert into ZYC.BUSI_PURCHASE_APPLY
PURCHASE_ID, BREED_NAME, BREED_STANDARD_LEVEL, BREED_AMOUNT, BREED_PRICE, BREED_PLACE, BREED_DESC, "STATUS", CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_MOBILE, APPLY_RESOURCE, APPROVER, APPROVE_TIME, DEPICT,
ZYC.SEQ_BUSI_PURCHASE_APPLY.NEXTVAL, #{breedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{breedStandardLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{breedAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{breedPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{breedPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{breedDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyMobile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{applyResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approver,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{depict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update ZYC.BUSI_PURCHASE_APPLY
BREED_NAME = #{breedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BREED_STANDARD_LEVEL = #{breedStandardLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BREED_AMOUNT = #{breedAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BREED_PRICE = #{breedPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BREED_PLACE = #{breedPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BREED_DESC = #{breedDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
"STATUS" = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APPLY_NAME = #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_MOBILE = #{applyMobile,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APPLY_RESOURCE = #{applyResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVE_TIME = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APPROVER = #{approver,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where PURCHASE_ID = #{purchaseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ZYC.BUSI_PURCHASE_APPLY set BREED_NAME = #{breedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BREED_STANDARD_LEVEL = #{breedStandardLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BREED_AMOUNT = #{breedAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BREED_PRICE = #{breedPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BREED_PLACE = #{breedPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BREED_DESC = #{breedDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "STATUS" = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APPLY_NAME = #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_MOBILE = #{applyMobile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPLY_RESOURCE = #{applyResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PURCHASE_ID = #{purchaseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select bpa.PURCHASE_ID, bpa.APPLY_NAME, to_char(bpa.APPLY_MOBILE) APPLY_MOBILE, bpa.APPLY_RESOURCE, bpa.BREED_NAME, bpa.BREED_STANDARD_LEVEL, bpa.BREED_PRICE, bpa.BREED_AMOUNT, bpa.BREED_PLACE, bpa.CREATE_TIME, bpa.UPDATE_TIME, bpa.STATUS, bpa.APPROVE_TIME, bpa.DEPICT, bu.USER_NAME as APPROVER_NAME from ZYC.BUSI_PURCHASE_APPLY bpa left join BOSS.BOSS_USER bu on bpa.APPROVER = bu.USER_ID where bpa.PURCHASE_ID = #{purchaseId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
